description: doc: link to notable blog posts

messages.text:
On 10 September 2011 06:34,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> I'm a little nervous about these web references in our comments, but
> they're probably a good idea.

I share your nervousness but I think there's a very small chance that
the URLs at blog.golang.org will go away, and the benefit here is
worth that risk.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I'm a little nervous about these web references in our comments, but they're probably a good idea. I wish URLs were truly U instead of just handy changeable aliases. http://codereview.appspot.com/4996041/diff/1/doc/docs.html File doc/docs.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/4996041/diff/1/doc/docs.html#newcode107 doc/docs.html:107:
  • Profiling Go Programs can you please put
    • on all these so they remain validish XML? also i think tidy will report these; i like to use tidy on my HTML edits. (you're using

    and is similar)

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f6fdb6a54203 ***
